title: Savage Grace
description: An Angel's GraceFrom the moment he saw her, her lovely flame hair spread about her shoulders like a glowing halo, Standing Wolf thought of no other. She was a vision - an angel with beautiful blue eyes that looked deep into his and saw his every emotion. She had rescued him, body and soul, and he knew that when he had finally claimed her as his one and only love, he would never leave her side.A Warrior's TouchShaylee had never dreamed that she would be given another chance at life and love. But Standing Wolf needed her as no one ever had: He was her destiny. As she nursed the handsome Cherokee warrior back to health, she longed to feel his heard muscled body beneath her fingertips and taste his sweet kisses. For only his touch could erase the pain of her past and unite them as one.
author: Cassie Edwards
